titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Eufemia Chua Philippine Nurses Association of Metropolitan Houston newsletters and clippings MS 778
titlestmt.author: Preston Mack, UNT Intern

publicationstmt.publisher: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-06-01 15:55:58 -0500.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.corpname: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

did.unittitle: Eufemia Chua Philippine Nurses Association of Metropolitan Houston newsletters and clippings
did.abstract: This collection consists of programs, newsletters, and clippings. These items were collected by Eufemia Chua during her time serving in leadership roles with the Philippine Nurses Association of Metropolitan Houston (PNAMH). The items included are from the years 1980, 1988, and 1996.

scopecontent.head: Content Description
scopecontent.p: The Eufemia Chua Philippine Nurses Association of Metropolitan Houston Collection contains programs, newsletters, and clippings. The programs contain the schedule of events for various PNAMH events. The newsletter contains various articles relating to PNAMH members. Details of meetings and events are listed in the clippings.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Eufemia Chua Philippine Nurses Association of Metropolitan Houston newsletters and clippings, 1980-1996, MS 778, Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from this material should be facilitated through the Woodson Research Center.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This material is open for research.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Eufemia Chua served as both vice president and later president of the PNAMH in the 1980s and 1990s. While serving in leadership roles of the PNAMH, Eufemia Chua served as head nurse of the gynecology department at the MD Anderson hospital. Eufemia Chua specialized in cancer nursing.

did.unittitle: Series I: Programs, clippings, and awards
Philippine Nurses Association of Metropolitan Houston Installation of Officers, event program
Newsclipping: "Nurses Gather in Houston," Filipino Reporter newspaper
Award of Brown Foundation, for Outstanding Cancer Nursing, Eufemia Chua, event program and clippings
